data.name: Seattle GNU/Linux (aka SeaGL)
data.description: SeaGL is a grassroots technical conference dedicated to spreading awareness and knowledge about the GNU/Linux community and free/libre/open-source software/hardware.

relatedRecords.name: Microsoft 365 Saturday San Antonio 2020
relatedRecords.description: Get your own corner of the Web for less! Register a new .COM for just $9.99 for the first year and get everything you need to make your mark online — website builder, hosting, email, and more.

data.name: General
data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.name: Stir Trek
relatedRecords.description: Stir Trek is a one-day conference in Columbus, Ohio focused on teaching software developers the latest and greatest in technologies, techniques, and tools. The full day of content is always concluded with a private screening of a blockbuster film on its opening day.

relatedRecords.name: Midwest Dreamin' 2019
relatedRecords.description: Midwest Dreamin’ is a conference organized by the Salesforce Community. Join this super user group meeting to learn and meet people in your community.
